fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You can choose to welcome guests into your house at night. If you do so, anyone who visits you will be protected with Basic defense for 3 nights. They will not know they were protected unless they get attacked. If the person who visits you tries to attack you, they will not get the protection. If you die, your ability fails and no one who visited you gets protection. You may only welcome guests thice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will know who visits you.
- You have safety measures that grant you Basic defense until you're attacked.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Welcome 3 guests without dying. (Give 3 players protection)

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
You were visited by \_\_\_\_\_\_ and welcomed them into your house.
(No notification for a player visiting a Host)
You were visited by \_\_\_\_\_\_, but they tried to attack you. Luckily, you were able to escape in time. (Saved by Basic scumshield)
